title: Ep. - 207 - DIRECTOR ANDREW JENKS FROM DREAM/KILLER
description:
Critically acclaimed director Andrew Jenks talks about his latest project Dream/Killer, a true crime documentary based on a man who took on the American justice system after his son Ryan Ferguson was sentenced to prison for a murder he claimed not to have committed. 


Kate’s son Jack reviews Expedition Unknown on the Discovery Channel. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
